intro: Tragia geraniifolia, commonly known as the heartleaf tragia, is a flowering plant native to the Americas. It is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and clusters of small, yellowish flowers. The plant is often found in dry, disturbed habitats such as roadsides and fields. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae, which includes many species with milky sap. Tragia geraniifolia is sometimes used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
